scripts.build: pnpm generate-addresses-file celo-alfajores && pnpm codegen && graph build && pnpm format
scripts.deploy:celo-alfajores: pnpm generate-addresses-file celo-alfajores && graph deploy --studio --network celo-alfajores metrom-uni-v3-celo-alfajores
scripts.deploy:arbitrum: pnpm generate-addresses-file arbitrum-one && graph deploy --studio --network arbitrum-one metrom-uni-v3-arbitrum
